title: The 2024 State of Platform Engineering? Fledgling at Best
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: The failures of DevOps continue to push organizations to form platform teams. But many aren't measuring results, says the latest report from Gitpod and Humanitec.
cntitle: 2024年平台工程现状？充其量还处于起步阶段
cndescription: DevOps 的失败持续推动着组织建立平台团队。但 Gitpod 和 Humanitec 的最新报告指出，许多组织并没有衡量结果。
